thread.title: Cops hunt 2 thugs who stole electronics from Bronx apartment
thread.title_full: Cops hunt 2 thugs who stole electronics from Bronx apartment - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Cops hunt 2 thugs who stole electronics from Bronx apartment
text:
NYPD The suspects allegedly broke into a second floor apartment on Merriam Ave. near W. 171st St. in Highbridge early Saturday. NYPD The pair allegedly stole a Michael Kors watch, two electronics tablets and an Xbox gaming system, according to police. Previous Next Enlarge Cops are looking for two thugs who stole electronics and a watch from a Bronx apartment, authorities said Friday.
The suspects entered through a fire escape window on a second floor apartment on Merriam Ave. near W. 171st St. in Highbridge just after 4:30 a.m. last Saturday, according to police.
They stole a Michael Kors watch, two electronics tablets and an Xbox gaming system, cops said.
Anyone with information is asked to call Crime Stoppers at (800) 577 - TIPS.
Related Stories Cops seek help in locating puppy stolen from Bronx apartment
